ygData.subject: RE: Where to find sewing kit molds in GFay?
ygData.msgSnippet: Make pots! They will get you to 122. I failed a lot less with pots than sewing kits. And if I remember correctly you only lose about 2g per successful attempt.
ygData.messageBody:
Make pots! They will get you to 122. I failed a lot less with pots than
sewing kits. And if I remember correctly you only lose about 2g per
successful attempt. You need standing legs mold and pot mold for these. They
can be found at the same merchant that has the Skewer and Scalar molds in
Kelethin.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Robert Spelman [SMTP:madoc_ab_owain@...]
> Sent: Saturday, July 31, 1999 10:53 AM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Where to find sewing kit molds in GFay?
>
> From: "Robert Spelman" <madoc_ab_owain@...>
>
> I've hit 115 skill and am looking to improve it, but can't seem to find
> the
> sewing kit molds at the vendors in Kelethin. Anyone know where else I
> might
> find them?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Araman, 16th Paladin, Felwithe, E'ci
>
